thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie
thread.title: Amy o'connor
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Amy o'connor

author: Amy o'connor
title: Amy o'connor
text:
I ordered the TV for delivery and asked that I get a call at least 30 mins before to confirm a time, so I never got any notification of when the delivery would occur, so that failed and then I discover that the post man tried to deliver it which means of course that he wouldn't take the old appliance away, which I thought under EU rules you, Harvey Norman had to do..
Harvey Norman you are appalling! I had a dreadful experience in November 2016 when I ordered and paid for almost â‚¬5000 worth of Kitchen equipment. I would never enter your shop again, but thought that on-line ordering might be easier, it's not, it's absolutely disgraceful!
